alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:14PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Archuleta and southeastern La Plata Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 214 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayfield, or 18 miles east of Durango, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Archuleta and southeastern La Plata Counties, including the following locations... Allison and Tiffany. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 101 and 126. Colorado 151 between mile markers 1 and 15, and between mile markers 17 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
